<img id="aimg_C5YPh" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" file="https://tc.z.wiki/autoupload/f/G54iIej6L1BvzKdA7pnCy71WwVz2lCmQpmDahrf2pk-yl5f0KlZfm6UsKj-HyTuv/20250706/Mk2v/585X797/image.png" onmouseover="img_onmouseoverfunc(this)" lazyloadthumb="1" border="0" alt="" src="https://tc.z.wiki/autoupload/f/G54iIej6L1BvzKdA7pnCy71WwVz2lCmQpmDahrf2pk-yl5f0KlZfm6UsKj-HyTuv/20250706/Mk2v/585X797/image.png"><br>
<br>
<font color="#595d69"><font face="system-ui, -apple-system, &amp;quot"><font size="4">本课程是专门为小学1-6年级的学生设计的语文写字课程，</font></font></font><br>
<font color="#595d69"><font face="system-ui, -apple-system, &amp;quot"><font size="4"><br>
</font></font></font><br>
<font size="4"><font color="#595d69"><font face="system-ui, -apple-system, &amp;quot">这门课程包含了“【</font></font><font style="color:rgb(89, 93, 105)"><font face="system-ui, -apple-system, &amp;quot">简小知</font></font><font color="#595d69"><font face="system-ui, -apple-system, &amp;quot">】小学1-6年级写字视频课程”，</font></font></font><br>
<font size="4"><font color="#595d69"><font face="system-ui, -apple-system, &amp;quot">以及每日打卡练习帖和统编语文同步生字字帖。</font></font></font><br>
<br>
<font color="#595d69"><font face="system-ui, -apple-system, &amp;quot"><font size="4"><br>
</font></font></font><br>
<img id="aimg_b6dz6" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" file="https://tc.z.wiki/autoupload/f/G54iIej6L1BvzKdA7pnCy71WwVz2lCmQpmDahrf2pk-yl5f0KlZfm6UsKj-HyTuv/20250706/r5hY/921X613/image.png" onmouseover="img_onmouseoverfunc(this)" lazyloadthumb="1" border="0" alt="" src="https://tc.z.wiki/autoupload/f/G54iIej6L1BvzKdA7pnCy71WwVz2lCmQpmDahrf2pk-yl5f0KlZfm6UsKj-HyTuv/20250706/r5hY/921X613/image.png"><font color="#595d69"></font><br>
<font color="#595d69"><font face="system-ui, -apple-system, &amp;quot"><font style="font-size:16px"><br>
</font></font></font><br>
<font color="#595d69"><font face="system-ui, -apple-system, &amp;quot"><font size="4">学生可以通过这个课程系统地学习如何书写汉字，还可以通过练习提高自己的书写技巧。</font></font></font><br>
<font color="#595d69"><font face="system-ui, -apple-system, &amp;quot"><font size="4"><br>
</font></font></font><br>
<font color="#595d69"><font face="system-ui, -apple-system, &amp;quot"><font size="4">这个课程将帮助学生在语文学习中建立良好的书写基础，为他们的学习打下坚实的基础。</font></font></font><br>
<br>
<font color="#595d69"><font face="system-ui, -apple-system, &amp;quot"><font style="font-size:16px"><br>
</font></font></font><br>
